definition: an investigation seeking answers, inquire into
details:
noun
- an investigation seeking answers
= example: an investigation seeking answers
- boarding and inspecting a ship on the high seas
= example: boarding and inspecting a ship on the high seas
- the activity of looking thoroughly in order to find something or someone
= synonyms: hunt
- the examination of alternative hypotheses
= example: the examination of alternative hypotheses
- an operation that determines whether one or more of a set of items has a specified property
= synonyms: lookup
verb
- inquire into
= example: inquire into
= synonyms: research
- try to locate or discover, or try to establish the existence of
= example: try to locate or discover, or try to establish the existence of
= synonyms: seek, look for
- subject to a search
= example: subject to a search
- search or seek
= synonyms: look
